indications: Indications fungal skin infections; vaginal candidiasis (section 7.2.2)
name: ECONAZOLE NITRATE
cautions:
Cautions 
(From 13.10.2 Antifungal preparations: British National Formulary)
Cautions Contact with eyes and mucous membranes should be avoided.
doses:
Skin infections apply twice daily; nail infections, apply
once daily under occlusive dressing
pregnancy: Pregnancy minimal absorption from skin; not known to be harmful
